description: Validates slash commands before execution to prevent unrecognized commands
installation_instructions: 2. Add the 'hook_configuration' content above to your ~/.claude/settings.json under the 'hooks' key
3. If you don't have a settings.json, create one with: {"hooks": <hook_configuration>}
4. Restart Claude Code for changes to take effect
testing: Try typing: /save (should be blocked with suggestion for /safe)
Try typing: /xyz123 (should be blocked with no suggestions)
